name: Reaper Rapport
description:
Reaper Rapport is a short experimental Rogue-Like

Reap the souls and kill the enemies of each stage, trying to get the further you can

· The map is randomly generated in each stage

· Heal yourself by atacking the enemies in the Reaper Mode

· Fill your Reaper Bar by hurting your foes

Credits:

Made by Jaime Mesa
